title: Drawing, 1929
medium: Brush and gouache, watercolor, silver, gold paint, graphite on white wove paper
inscribed: Inscribed in pen and red ink at center left: 478; in graphite at lower right: 2
provenance: University Reseach Library, University of California, Los Angeles; Henry Dreyfuss
creditline: Gift of University of California, Los Angeles
description: Three art deco designs in triangular shapes; a large triangle above with skyscraper-like ornament, and two smaller triangles below with same ornament in different colorways.

exhibitions.title: The Cooper-Hewitt Collections: A Design Resource

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, 1929.
1929. Brush and gouache, watercolor, silver, gold paint, graphite on white wove paper. Gift of University of California, Los Angeles. 1973-15-58.
